Class EasterDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • EasterDate

  • public class EasterDate
extends java.lang.Object
    This EasterDate class is a class that calculates the EasterDate. The fields for this class is easterDate of type Date. It stores the calculated easterDate

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] aprilCount 
      private java.lang.Integer[] aprilEasterDays 
      private Date easterDate 
      private int[] marchCount 
      private java.lang.Integer[] marchEasterDays 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Default constructor with the year as an input.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static int[] calculateEasterDate(int y)
      Calculate the Easter Date in the year using the Anonymous Gregorian algorithm based on wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computus#Anonymous_Gregorian_algorithm
      void calculateOneCycle()
      This method calculates the Easter Date for one entire cycle which lasts for 5,700,000 years.
      private void printDatesOccurrence()
      Prints the number of times Easter lands on a specific date
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString method that overrides the default toString method from the Object class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EasterDate

        public EasterDate(int year)
        Default constructor with the year as an input. It calls the
        Parameters:
        year - year of the easter date

    • Method Detail

      • calculateEasterDate

        private static int[] calculateEasterDate(int y)
        Calculate the Easter Date in the year using the Anonymous Gregorian algorithm based on wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computus#Anonymous_Gregorian_algorithm
        Parameters:
        y - the year we want to find out the easter date for
        Returns:
        a integer array of size 2. int[0] stores month and int[1] stores the day

      • calculateOneCycle

        public void calculateOneCycle()
        This method calculates the Easter Date for one entire cycle which lasts for 5,700,000 years. Then it will print the number of times Easter lands on a specific date for one cycle.

      • printDatesOccurrence

        private void printDatesOccurrence()
        Prints the number of times Easter lands on a specific date

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString method that overrides the default toString method from the Object class.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String. The calculated Easter Date in the format month day, year
